ygData.subject: RE: Pixie Strike broken (was Charm)
ygData.msgSnippet: what is exactly wrong with it again?  in the ghoul lord room last night, with 2 boks and the lord we decided that i use pixie strike to take one bok out of the
ygData.messageBody:
what is exactly wrong with it again? in the ghoul lord room last night,
with 2 boks and the lord we decided that i use pixie strike to take one bok
out of the equation while the lord and other bok were killed. hell i will
admit i have not used this song in combat much (worked good in duels)
because frankly i was never asked to nor has the situation come up much
where i was in charge of messing. it took many tries to get the bok messed,
even though i got no resist messages, but after the first few tries once it
finally stuck i could sing it repeatedly and keep him messed indefinitely.
i have very little experience with the song so i am wondering what it is
that is broken or what i should expect.

Shada Bladestorm, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Manda, Level 15 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Mon, 18 Oct 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
> >
> > Was Pixie Strike not working properly mentioned in the GZ
> letter? Are bards
> > with the capability to sing this song submitting bug
> reports? I assume some
> > of you have. Perhaps if enough people submit a bug report
> it will get
> > fixed.
>
> It was not in the letter. I've been /bugging it. Now that
> I'm hitting the upper level limit for charm, I'm getting more
> annoyed by it and will probably fire off an email to GZ asking
> about it at some point.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
